43 int size;

48// WADFILE I/O related stuff.

50
51typedef struct lumpinfo_s lumpinfo_t;
52typedef int lumpindex_t;
53
54struct lumpinfo_s
55{
56 char name[8];
57 wad_file_t *wad_file;
58 int position;
59 int size;
60 void *cache;
61
62 // Used for hash table lookups
63 lumpindex_t next;
64};
65
